segments.text: I'm really quite cross with this whole situation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just standing there, utterly useless in her task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Can she not see the massive puddle forming at her feet?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's astounding, her complete detachment from reality.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just flowing endlessly, a ridiculous waste.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And those children! Climbing on that flimsy stool right behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's supposed to be supervising them, not polishing plates in a flood.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This level of negligence is simply unacceptable in a household.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The potential for injury and damage is enormous because of her inattention.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe the sink is completely overflowing without a reaction.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It makes me so mad to see such a preventable mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone really needs to take charge here and stop this nonsense.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Everything is going wrong, and she just continues her routine.
segments.speaker: PAR
